Posted By: wolfv (1/29/2010 4:11:15 PM)

posts.post_content: For mono-red mages looking for a way to kill this guy (or any pro-red, for that matter), any sweeper spell that does damage to EACH creature ([Pyroclasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyroclasm), [Volcanic Fallout](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Fallout), [Chain Reaction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chain Reaction), etc.) combined with any effect that makes damage unpreventable ([Unstable Footing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unstable Footing) works best) will get through his protection. Not the most efficient answer ever, but at least he isn't invincible.
posts.html:
For mono-red mages looking for a way to kill this guy (or any pro-red, for that matter), any sweeper spell that does damage to EACH creature (Pyroclasm, Volcanic Fallout, Chain Reaction, etc.) combined with any effect that makes damage unpreventable (Unstable Footing works best) will get through his protection. Not the most efficient answer ever, but at least he isn't invincible.

posts.post_content:
I dont know if this is better than what [Burrenton Forge-Tender](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burrenton Forge-Tender) was in standard, but it still fills that voided slot in side boards. Too bad his second ability defensively sucks compared to the Kithkins :-\  
  
(I did notice it was a life gain whenever **any** player plays a red spell though)
